entry.title: Sweetarts Ropes Twisted Rainbow Punch - 3.5oz
entry.summary:
Vendor: Ferrara Candy Co.
Type: Candy
Price: 3.99

An Irresistible Tart and Fruity Combo!

      SweeTARTS Ropes are a delightful and chewy snack you won't be able to put down once you start munching! Packed with the perfect blend of sweet and tart flavour, it's fruity, bendable, licorice fun. 

     Each bite of Twisted Rainbow Punch creates a powerful explosion of flavour in your mouth, a mix of so many delicious fruits all come together to give you the ultimate chewy candy experience. The tart filling on the inside of each rope is a delectable contrast to the bright, fruity flavours that wrap around it.


3.5oz / 99.2g | 1 share pack

entry.title: Laffy Taffy Laff Bites - 119g
entry.summary:
Vendor: Ferrara Candy Co.
Type: Candy
Price: 1.99

New Laffy Taffy Candy!

Take a delicious bite out of some real fun with the Laffy Taffy Laff Bites! These tasty candies come with a crunchy outside shell and are chewy on the inside. A little smaller in size so you can easily just pop them in your mouth!
Comes in some amazing fruity flavours like Cherry, Strawberry, Green Apple and Blue Raspberry! This candy even comes with an added drop of flavour for an even more enjoyable and intense tasting candy-eating experience!
Fill your belly with the yumminess of the Laffy Taffy Bites!

119 g

entry.title: Laffy Taffy Laff Bites Gone Bananas! - 119g
entry.summary:
Vendor: Ferrara Candy Co.
Type: Candy
Price: 1.99

Laffy Taffy has gone Bananas!

Really go bananas with this delicious candy! The Laffy Taffy Bites Gone Bananas are not only a bag full of complete fun, but I think they're probably Willy Wonka's Favourite!
Filled with the chewiness of the original banana Laffy Taffy goodness with a crunchy candy shell on the outside, these are a must-try candy! 
Go Bananas but in a sweet way, with the Laffy taffy Bites Gone Bananas!

119 g

entry.title: SweeTARTS Ropes Tangy Strawberry - 141 g
entry.summary:
Vendor: Ferrara Candy Co.
Type: Candy District
Price: 4.49

New Sweetarts Candy

You'll love to be at the end of this delicious rope! The Sweetarts Ropes Tangy Strawberry is a soft and chewy candy much like licorice, that is filled with the aromatic scent of sweet and tangy strawberry!

Each bite is beyond flavourful and has the perfect amount of chewiness. This Wonka Candy could very soon become your new favourite candy!
Put the tang back into your life with the Sweetarts Ropes Tangy Strawberry Candy!

141 g

Retro Candy from Willy Wonka

 Ignite your inner child (and your tastebuds) with this fun and flavourful candy! The Lik-M-Aid Fun Dip Grape Cherry Apple is a retro candy that is a sweet blast from the past!
Comes with two candy sticks to dip into the delicious fruity flavours of Razz Apple Magic Dip, Cherry Yum Diddly Dip and Grape Yumtious Dip! 
This Wonka Candy is filled with the yummy wonderment of good old fashioned candy fun! 
Taste that fun again with the Lik-M-Aid Fun Dip Grape Cherry Apple!

Retro Candy from the 1960s

Full of tanginess and the magic of Willy Wonka, the Sweetarts Giant Chewy Candy are full of intense and chewy flavour!
A softer and chewier version of the original Sweetarts Candy. Coming in the giant, tart and tangy flavours of Green, Purple and Red. 
Feel the magic, with this delicious retro candy the Sweetarts Giant Chewy Candy!

Laffy Taffy Tropical Guava & Pineapple Mini Bars 

Just relax, sit back and get your tastebuds ready for a delicious tasting tropical journey with the Laffy Taffy Mini Bars!
These Laffy Taffy Bars are more than flavourful. Packed with the exotic taste of Pineapple and Guava, you might even need your sunglasses!

entry.title: Nerds Gummy Clusters Theater Pack - 85 g
entry.summary:
Vendor: Ferrara Candy Co.
Type: Candy
Price: 2.29

New Nerds Candy

You can crunch and chew your way through a sweet rainbow of candy, with the irresistible Nerds Gummy Clusters in Theater Size!

These bite-sized, colourful gems consist of a chewy and supple middle and are sweetly coated with Rainbow Nerds! Relish in the intense flavours of Strawberry, Grape, Orange and Lemonade.
This Wonka Candy goodness is almost like magic, experience the yummy fun, with the Nerds Gummy Clusters Theater Pack!

85 g

entry.title: Nerds Gummy Clusters Candy - 5 oz.
entry.summary:
Vendor: Ferrara Candy Co.
Type: Candy
Price: 3.59

New Nerds Gummy Candy

You remember the crunch of Nerds candy from when you were a kid. Now enjoy that experience mixed with a sweet gummy center. You’ll get all the best of Nerds Rainbow variety, including orange, grape, strawberry, and lemonade flavours. It’s only too easy to get addicted to Nerds Gummy Clusters Candy, so make sure you pick up more than one pack.

Do you love Nerds Rope? If so, you’re bound to enjoy Nerds Gummy Cluster Candy. These clusters have the texture and flavour combination of Nerds Rope, with the same fruity chewiness covered with Nerds crunch. These bite-sized bundles are what you crave.

5 oz.

entry.title: Pixy Stix - 113 g
entry.summary:
Vendor: Ferrara Candy Co.
Type: Candy
Price: 3.99

Retro Candy inspired by Willy Wonka

Straws full of delightful candy powder, Pixy Stix is a retro candy classic we've all loved for decades. You're all set to enjoy sweet and tangy cherry, maui punch, grape, and orange flavours. You'll want to share these with the whole family when you learn they're free of artificial flavours.

With Pixy Stix, you can pour the candy powder into your mouth for a portable sweet fix. Or if you prefer, you can put it in your hand. You'll get a plentiful bag of Pixy Stix when you place your order. Stock up and put a bigger number in the Quantity box, so you have a fun candy stash for a while to come.

Each Pixy Stix straw is loaded with sweet and tart candy powder that is sure to put a smile on every face. Pour into your hand or straight into your mouth for a little pop of pure delight.

    113 g

entry.title: Chewy Gobstopper Jawbreakers Theater Box - 3.75 oz.
entry.summary:
Vendor: Ferrara Candy Co.
Type: Candy
Price: 2.09

Chewy Gobstoppers Jawbreakers 

Retro Candy inspired by Willy Wonka and the Chocolate Factory

Chewy Gobstoppers are inspired by the original Everlasting Gobstoppers. Yes, they still have layers and layers of fruity flavours but with a chewy center. Enjoy them as they change colours and flavours as they delight your tastebuds.

3.75 oz. Theater Pack

Ingredients:

Dextrose, Corn Syrup, and Less than 2% of Maltodextrin, Hydrogenated Coconut Oil, Malic Acid, Calcium Stearate, Egg Albumen, Mono- and Diglycerides, Carnauba Wax, Natural Flavors, Color Added, Blue 1, Blue 2 Lake, Red 40 Lake, Yellow 5, Yellow 5 Lake, Yellow 6, Sunflower Lecithin, Mineral Oil.

entry.title: Nerds Rope Tropical Candy - 92 oz
entry.summary:
Vendor: Ferrara Candy Co.
Type: Candy
Price: 1.69

Tropical Nerds Rope Gummy Candy 

From the Imagination Room of Willy Wonka

Nerds Rope Tropical Gummy Candies are a fascinating candy! A soft delicious gummy candy rope, completely encrusted with colourful, tangy, crunchy Nerds candy! Nerds Rope Tropical Candies are a double whammy in the candy world! Two treats in one! Coming in at twelve inches long, Nerd Rope Tropical is impressive, stretchy and bendable, fun to play with and delicious to eat! You'll be hang'in on to this rope! 

.92 oz Pack

Ingredients: Dextrose, Sugar, Corn Syrup, 2% or Less of Malic Acid, Gelatin, Glycerin, Natural Flavors, Citric Acid, Confectioner's Glaze (Lac-Resin), Carnauba Wax, Color Added, Blue 1, Red 40, Red 40 Lake, Yellow 5, Yellow 5 Lake, Yellow 6.

entry.title: Laffy Taffy Trolls World Tour Candy - 108 g
entry.summary:
Vendor: Ferrara Candy Co.
Type: Candy
Price: 2.49

Laffy Taffy is a joke.

If you've ever had Laffy Taffy, you know this brand is a fantastic fruity flavour and delightfully chewy, splendidly stretchy confection. And there are fun jokes from Trolls World Tour on each and every wrapper. It's time to enjoy this colourful bag of whimsical and wonky treats. They're great for kids and adults alike. Get your family ready for a rollicking good time opening and eating these terrific taffies.

This isn't your everyday candy. The mischievous Troll joke on every wrapping makes each piece suspenseful and exciting for young and old alike. It's a great treat for your family to share with friends.

108 g

entry.title: Lik-M-Aid Fun Dip Sour Candy - 40.5g
entry.summary:
Vendor: Ferrara Candy Co.
Type: Candy
Price: 1.99

Lik-M-Aid Fun Dip Sour Candy

A classic retro candy from the imagination room of Willy Wonka.

Your taste buds are waiting. Get dipping into Watermelon Whammo Dip, Strawberry Smackeroo Dip, and Tartastic Mystery Dip with the two candy dipping sticks included. Each package had four detachable pouches, meaning you can have one now and save the rest of your treat for later. Lik-M-Aid Fun Dip Sour Candy is sourlicious to the extreme.

This pack of 24 means you and your family will have hours of sour sensations for days to come. As if tempting strawberry and mouth-watering watermelon weren't enough, there's a mystery dip flavour, as well. Which flavour will be your favourite? You'll have plenty of time to experiment and decide.

40.5 g Pack

entry.title: Nerds Sour Big Chewy Candy - 170 g
entry.summary:
Vendor: Ferrara Candy Co.
Type: Candy
Price: 3.59

From the Imagination Room

Want a tart and sour snack but can't decide if you want a crunchy or chewy texture? Never fear! Sour Big Chewy Nerds Candy is here.

 Devour a 170 g bag in a hurry or just have a few treats a day. There's a kick of sweetness in this candy to go along with its sour zing. And the flavours are ones that'll get your taste buds going into overdrive – Blue Raspberry, Strawberry Lemonade, Watermelon, and Blood Orange.

170 g Bag

Freshest Candy at the Sweetest Prices!

Shipped Fast across Canada and the USA!

From the Imagination Room

Get a sweet treat like the kind you got from the corner store all those years ago, but without all those artificial flavours your parents nagged you about. A nice crunch greets you on the outside while a chewy center awaits within. It's just the combination you've been craving. So order your bag now!

This fun-loving bag of Nerds Big Chewy Candy will brighten your day.  Flavours include strawberry, lemon, orange and grape. Is your mouth watering yet? It will be when you open this colourful bag. If one bag isn't enough to satisfy your craving, then stock up your pantry and get a 12-count box. That will set you up for a while!

170 g Bag

entry.title: Nerds Filled Gumballs - 46 g
entry.summary:
Vendor: Oak Leaf
Type: Candy
Price: 1.59

Nerds Gumball 5 Ball Tube

These Nerds Gumballs will mystify you! Gumballs filled with Nerds Candy! Upon tasting this gum, you will quickly forget this question. You will be too busy chewing and enjoying its intense fruity flavour! Grape, lemon, orange and lime flavoured gumballs, completely jam-packed with Nerds Candy! How does Willy Wonka do it? These Nerds Gumballs are incredible! Nerds Filled Gumballs come 5 gumballs to a tube and are fruity flavoured.
  • Made in Canada
  • Gluten-Free

46 g Pack 

Ingredients:

Sugar, Dextrose, Corn Syrup, Gum Base, Natural And Artificial Flavours, Malic Acid, Glazing Agent (Resinous Glaze), Glycerine, Thickener (Tapioca Dextrin), Glazing Agent (Carnauba Wax), Antioxidant (E321), Colours (Including E120, E102, E110, E127, E129, E133, E132).

entry.title: Laffy Taffy Sour Apple & Blue Raspberry Taffy Theater Box
entry.summary:
Vendor: Nestle Candy Shop
Type: Candy
Price: 2.09

Retro Candy from the 1970s

This retro candy, inspired by Willy Wonka, will add an exciting and fun-filled sweet element to movie night! Laffy Taffy Sour Apple & Blue Raspberry Taffy are luscious, chewy pieces of individually wrapped taffy with a great tasting, fruity combination of Sour Apple and Blue Raspberry. Not only is this candy as magically delicious as Willy Wonka is, but it's also fun! Every wrapper comes with a joke, so even if your movie isn't all that "funny" your candy will be filled with laughs!
  • Made in the USA
  • No Artificial Flavours

3.3 oz Theater Pack | 8 Count Box

-

Ingredients: 

Corn Syrup, Sugar, Palm Oil, and Less than 2% of Malic Acid, Mono- and Diglycerides, Hydrogenated Cottonseed Oil, Salt, Soy Lecithin, Natural Flavor, Blue 1, Yellow 5.

entry.title: Original Spree Candy Theater Box - 5 oz.
entry.summary:
Vendor: Candy District
Type: Candy
Price: 2.49

Retro Candy from the 1980s

The Spree Candy Theater Box is "scrumdiddlyumptious" and will make any movie night fun and sweet! Spree Candy is a retro candy from the 1980s. Bright and colourful, and filled with the fruity magic of Willy Wonka! Sweet on the outside and tart in the middle, the original Spree Candy Theater Box comes in a variety of flavours including Cherry, Orange, Lemon, Green Apple, and Grape. Venture into a delicious candy eating spree, with the Original Spree candy Theater Box!
5 oz.

entry.title: Giant Pixy Stix - .42 oz.
entry.summary:
Vendor: Ferrara Candy Co.
Type: Candy
Price: 0.69

Retro Candy inspired by Willy Wonka

This must be what all the most magical creatures love to eat! With their sweet and tangy powdery power, the Pixy Stix is like no other!  It really is pure Wonka Candy bliss! Pixy Stix is a powdered candy that comes packaged in a straw. This is, of course, consumed by pouring (or dumping) the contents directly into your mouth. This fun-to-eat candy comes in a choice of four fantastic flavours: Grape, Maui Punch, Cherry and Orange. There is no such thing as an afternoon lull with the delicious and fun taste of Pixy Stix! Stock up your pantry with this 85 Count Box just in case you have family and friends come over and a party breaks out. Just in case.
  • No Artificial Colours
  • Box contains 85 Pixy Stix

.42 oz. Straw
